abstract: Investing so you can live comfortably past 100 means having a diversified portfolio of stocks, bonds and annuities.
snippet: Investing so you can live comfortably past 100 means having a diversified portfolio of stocks, bonds and annuities.
lead_paragraph: WITH stock prices advancing smartly  both the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index have gained more than 22 percent in the last six months  retirees who fled to the safety of money market funds and savings accounts when the market plunged in 2008 and 2009 may well want to move some assets back into stocks.

headline.main: Go Play Golf, but Monitor Your Portfolio Too
headline.print_headline: Go Play Golf, but Monitor Your Portfolio Too
